The duration of the antipoison lasts six minutes, the same time as a superantipoison does. The restore value obtained per dose is 4 + 30% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected skills.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 72Buy limit: 2000Examine: A 1 dose Sanfew Serum.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Sanfew serumImage: File:Sanfew serum(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.020Value: 120Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 13 March 2007Item ID: 10931

Sanfew serum combines the properties of super restore, superantipoison, and Relicym's balm potions (though, unlike the latter, will provide fifteen minutes of immunity to disease when consumed). The duration of the antipoison lasts six minutes, the same time as a superantipoison does. The restore value obtained per dose is 4 + 30% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected skills.

Sanfew serum is made by adding, in order, unicorn horn dust, clean snake weed and nail beast nails to an already made super restore. Partially completed Sanfew serums are called mixture - step 1 and step 2, but are not drinkable in these forms. Level 65 Herblore and completion of Zogre Flesh Eaters is required in order to make this potion.

96 Herblore experience is given for a completed 1-dose Sanfew serum, 128 experience for a 2-dose serum, 160 experience for a 3-dose serum and 192 experience for a 4-dose serum. Or more simply, the total experience given can be calculated with: E x p e r i e n c e = 32 × D o s e s + 64 {\displaystyle Experience=32\times Doses+64}

Sanfew serums can also be used on nail beasts, which can deal 20-40 damage per dose and grants melee experience. This requires the player to have no weapons equipped; if they do, it will automatically be unequipped if there is space in their inventory.

As Sanfew serums' higher price often makes super restores and prayer potions more cost efficient for restoring prayer, Sanfew serums are notably useful in situations where prayer restoration as well as poison protection are needed and inventory space is limited, such as Dagannoth Kings, as it fulfills the two requirements in one inventory space. Similarly, Sanfew serums are effective for fighting The Nightmare as they offer the same utility against parasites as Relicym's balm while also offering prayer restoration.

If a ring of the gods (i) or Prayer cape is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the prayer restore increases to 4 + 32% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Creation
  • 3 Price per dose

    • 4.1 Sanfew serum(4)

Effects[edit | edit source]

Stat restore is calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 3 10 ⌋ + 4 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {3}{10}}\rfloor +4}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +4 34-36 +14 67-69 +24
4-6 +5 37-39 +15 70-73 +25
7-9 +6 40-43 +16 74-76 +26
10-13 +7 44-46 +17 77-79 +27
14-16 +8 47-49 +18 80-83 +28
17-19 +9 50-53 +19 84-86 +29
20-23 +10 54-56 +20 87-89 +30
24-26 +11 57-59 +21 90-93 +31
27-29 +12 60-63 +22 94-96 +32
30-33 +13 64-66 +23 97-99 +33

If a ring of the gods (i) or Prayer cape is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the amount of restored Prayer points is calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 32 100 ⌋ + 4 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {32}{100}}\rfloor +4}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +4 35-37 +15 69-71 +26
4-6 +5 38-40 +16 72-74 +27
7-9 +6 41-43 +17 75-78 +28
10-12 +7 44-46 +18 79-81 +29
13-15 +8 47-49 +19 82-84 +30
16-18 +9 50-53 +20 85-87 +31
19-21 +10 54-56 +21 88-90 +32
22-24 +11 57-59 +22 91-93 +33
25-28 +12 60-62 +23 94-96 +34
29-31 +13 63-65 +24 97-99 +35
32-34 +14 66-68 +25

Creation[edit | edit source]

The full creation process requires an untradeable ingredient, Snake weed, which can only found by searching marshy jungle vines south-west of Tai Bwo Wannai or as a drop from Jogres and Tribesmen.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

7 April 2016
(update)

Drinking any kind of antipoison will no longer decrease your poison immunity.

1 May 2014
(update)

Sanfew serum is now correctly considered a potion rather than food when applying consumption delays and within the Duel Arena.

'''Sanfew serum''' combines the properties of [[super restore]], [[superantipoison]], and [[Relicym's balm]] [[potions]] (though, unlike the latter, will provide fifteen minutes of immunity to [[disease]] when consumed). The duration of the antipoison lasts six minutes, the same time as a superantipoison does. The restore value obtained per dose is 4 + 30% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected skills. 

Sanfew serum is made by adding, in order, [[unicorn horn dust]], [[Snake weed|clean snake weed]] and [[nail beast nails]] to an already made [[super restore]]. Partially completed Sanfew serums are called [[mixture - step 1]] and [[mixture - step 2|step 2]], but are not drinkable in these forms. Level 65 [[Herblore]] and completion of [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] is required in order to make this potion.

96 [[Herblore]] experience is given for a completed 1-dose Sanfew serum, 128 experience for a 2-dose serum, 160 experience for a 3-dose serum and 192 experience for a 4-dose serum. Or more simply, the total experience given can be calculated with: <math>Experience = 32 \times Doses + 64</math>

Sanfew serums can also be used on [[nail beast]]s, which can deal 20-40 damage per dose and grants [[melee]] [[experience]]. This requires the player to have no weapons equipped; if they do, it will automatically be unequipped if there is space in their [[inventory]].

As Sanfew serums' higher price often makes [[super restore]]s and [[prayer potion]]s more cost efficient for restoring prayer, Sanfew serums are notably useful in situations where prayer restoration as well as poison protection are needed and inventory space is limited, such as [[Dagannoth Kings]], as it fulfills the two requirements in one inventory space. Similarly, Sanfew serums are effective for fighting [[The Nightmare]] as they offer the same utility against [[parasite]]s as [[Relicym's balm]] while also offering prayer restoration.

If a [[ring of the gods (i)]] or [[Prayer cape]] is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or [[holy wrench]] is in the player's inventory, the ''prayer'' restore increases to 4 + 32% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

Stat restore is calculated with: <math>\lfloor SkillLevel \times \frac{3}{10} \rfloor + 4</math>

The full creation process requires an untradeable ingredient, [[Snake weed]], which can only found by searching [[Marshy jungle vine|marshy jungle vines]] south-west of [[Tai Bwo Wannai]] or as a drop from [[Jogre|Jogres]] and [[Tribesman|Tribesmen]].

{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes

}}
{{Subject changes

|change = Drinking any kind of antipoison will no longer decrease your poison immunity.

{{Subject changes
|date = 1 May 2014
|update = Spirit trees, clues & more!
